about_the_game:
KNOCKturne is an RPG game that tells the story of the protagonist's adventure to free a boss with many emotions in her dreams and escape from there.

The main character, Peppy, is an ordinary adult. The story begins one day when she falls asleep with a dreamcatcher, a gift from a childhood friend.
What dreams will she be invited to and how will she wake up from her deep sleep?

There are no weapons to defeat the bosses, only skills to manipulate their emotions.


KNOCKturne is a dream world created from the emotions of your memories.
No weapons exist in KNOCKturne, and you can't try to fight them.
All you can do is read your opponent's mind and respond accordingly.
You can extend a hand of reconciliation, or you can see their cries of regret.

The protagonist's world is made up of finely crafted graphics and sound.


Graphics and illustrations reminiscent of gruesome fairy tales in a beautiful world created in Unreal 5.
An atmospheric soundtrack that encompasses the story.
Interact with mysterious NPCs and take a look inside yourself.

Turn-based battles that combine strategic skill use with bullet games.


The boss's emotions are trying to harm you. Dodge their attacks and collect Emotional Energy.
You can use the collected Emotional Energy to continue the conversation.

name: KNOCKturne

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 570, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7850, 2 GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: KNOCKturne is an RPG game that tells the story of the protagonist's adventure to free a boss with many emotions in his dreams and escape from there.
